korean: 뒷좌석에 편하게 앉아서 가니까 정말 좋았어.
기사님이 길을 잘 아셔서 빨리 도착했다.
가끔은 이렇게 편하게 가는 것도 필요한 것 같다.
english: I was too tired, so I took a taxi today.
It felt really nice to sit comfortably in the back seat.
The driver knew the roads well, so we arrived quickly.
Sometimes it seems necessary to travel comfortably like this.
